item.title: Simple Algorithms
item.description: Safe average of two numbers Obvious solution $(a + b) / 2$ This is correct but the danger lies in the overflow issues. Let’s assume a and b are the maximum Integer values available (in Java it would be 2147483647). The sum would be over the maximal value. Yielding the incorrect result. One could also cast to the the bigger type (e.g from int to long) but this is not a solution.
